content:
é¡¹ç›®åç§°ï¼šLiteAI-SDK

# é¡¹ç›®æè¿°

LiteAI-SDK æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå°è£…äº† [LiteLLM](https://github.com/BerriAI/litellm)ï¼Œæ—¨åœ¨æä¾›æ›´ç›´è§‚çš„ API å’Œæ›´æ–¹ä¾¿çš„å·¥å…·æ¥å…¥çš„ Python åº“ã€‚å¾—ç›Šäº LiteLLM å¯¹äºå„ç§ LLM ä¾›åº”å•†çš„é€‚é…ï¼ŒLiteAI-SDK èƒ½è®©ä½ ç”¨æ›´ç®€å•çš„ä»£ç æ¥å…¥å„ç§ä¸»æµ LLM æä¾›å•†ã€‚

## æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½

Python å‡½æ•°ç›´æ¥ä½œä¸ºå·¥å…·æ¥å…¥ï¼š

```python
import os
from liteai_sdk import LLM, LlmProviders, LlmRequestParams, UserMessage

def example_tool():
    """
    This is a test tool that is used to test the tool calling functionality.
    """
    print("The example tool is called.")
    return "Hello World"

llm = LLM(provider=LlmProviders.OPENAI,
          api_key=os.getenv("API_KEY", ""),
          base_url=os.getenv("BASE_URL", ""))

params = LlmRequestParams(
        model="deepseek-v3.1",
        tools=[example_tool],
        messages=[UserMessage("...")])
```

åœ¨è¯†åˆ«åˆ°æ¨¡å‹è¿”å›å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨æŒ‡ä»¤æ—¶è‡ªåŠ¨è¿›è¡Œå·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨ï¼ˆç”± execute_tools å‚æ•°æ§åˆ¶ï¼‰ï¼š
```python
def example_tool():
    """
    This is a test tool that is used to test the tool calling functionality.
    """
    print("The example tool is called.")
    return "Hello World"

llm = LLM(provider=LlmProviders.OPENAI,
          api_key=os.getenv("API_KEY", ""),
          base_url=os.getenv("BASE_URL", ""))

params = LlmRequestParams(
        model="deepseek-v3.1",
        tools=[example_tool],
        execute_tools=True,
        messages=[UserMessage("Please call the tool example_tool.")])

print("User: ", "Please call the tool example_tool.")
messages = llm.generate_text_sync(params)
for message in messages:
    match message.role:
        case "assistant":
            print("Assistant: ", message.content)
        case "tool":
            print("Tool: ", message.content)

""" outputs:
User:  Please call the tool example_tool.
The example tool is called.
Assistant:  I'll call the example_tool for you.
Tool:  "Hello World"
"""
```

title: ã€å¼€æºè‡ªèã€‘Awesome Gemini3 pro promptsç«çˆ†æç¤ºè¯åˆ†äº«repo
content: # åšäº†ä¸€ä¸ªä»“åº“ï¼Œæ”¶å½•äº†å¾ˆå¤šXä¸Šå¤§ç¥åˆ›ä½œçš„Gemini3 æç¤ºè¯ ğŸ‘‰ https://github.com/ZeroLu/awesome-gemini-ai éƒ¨åˆ†å†…å®¹å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š --- ## 1. Web Development & Coding Optimize your workflow with these **Gemini coding prompts**. These are designed to utilize Gemini's reasoning capabilities to build complex applications in a single shot. ### 1.1. Futuristic AI Agency Landing Page (Next.js 14) *A massive context prompt to generate a high-performance, award-winning style website.* **Prompt:** ```text You are an award-winning Creative Developer and UI/UX Designer known for building Awwwards-winning websites. You specialize in "AI-First" aesthetics using shaders, glassmorphism, and fluid motion to create interfaces that feel alive. Task: Build a high-performance, interactive landing page for an AI Software Development Agency using Next.js 14 (App Router), Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, and React Three Fiber (for shaders). Agency Services (Content): The agency helps clients build: - AI Full-Stack SaaS (Next-gen applications) - AI Agents (Autonomous worker bots) - RAG Pipelines (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) - Custom Video Solutions (AI video generation/editing tools) - Custom n8n Workflows (Advanced automation) Design "Skill" & Guidelines (STRICT ADHERENCE REQUIRED): Refusing generic "AI Slop" design patterns is your highest priority. Typography (Crucial): - DO NOT USE: Inter, Roboto, Open Sans, Segoe UI, or system defaults. - USE: distinctive, technical fonts. - Headings: Space Grotesk or Syne (Bold, tight tracking). - Body: JetBrains Mono or DM Sans (Clean, legible, technical feel). - Rule: Use extreme contrast in weights (Light 200 vs Black 800) and large size jumps. Visuals & Atmosphere: - Backgrounds: Never use solid flat colors. Create "Atmosphere." Use deep, dark voids (#030305) layered with radial gradients, mesh gradients, or subtle noise textures. - Shaders: Implement a background shader (using React Three Fiber or a GLSL canvas) that reacts to mouse movement. - Color Palette: Dark Mode focus. Deep Obsidian / Midnight Blue backgrounds with sharp, neon accents (Electric Blue #3B82F6, Cyber Purple #8B5CF6, or Acid Green). Motion & Interactivity: - Staggered Reveals: Do not fade everything in at once. Use framer-motion to stagger children elements. - Scroll Animations: Elements should float up, blur-in, or scale up as the user scrolls. - Micro-interactions: Buttons should have magnetic effects or liquid hover states. Cards should tilt (3D parallax) on hover. Layout: - Avoid standard Bootstrap/Centered layouts. - Use Bento Grids (asymmetrical grid layouts) for the Services section. - Use overlapping elements and negative space to create depth. Implementation Plan: - Header: A holographic glassmorphism navbar. - Hero Section: massive typography, shader background, "Book a Call" button with a glowing border. - Services (The Bento Grid): A responsive grid showcasing the 5 services mentioned above. - Why Us: A section explaining the "AI First" approach using a comparison UI (Old Way vs. AI Way). - Footer: massive interactive footer with a "let's build the future" marquee. Output: Write the complete, functional code for the landing page (in React.js). If you need to split components, provide them in a logical order. Start by defining the shader component, then the UI components, then the main page assembly. ``` *Source: [@code_bucks](https://x.com/code_bucks/status/1990880415104544984)* ### 1.2. Enterprise Landing Page Generator *Great for quickly mocking up professional business pages.* **Prompt:** ```text Generate an enterprise-grade professional [DESCRIBE YOUR BUSINESS] landing page. Add interactive elements, animations, and make it fully responsive. Surprise me, be creative, do this step by step. ``` *Source: [@godofprompt](https://x.com/godofprompt/status/1991146150859039013)* ### 1.3. "Winnux" OS Simulator *A complex prompt testing Gemini's ability to manage state and simulate operating systems.* **Prompt:** ```text Build a fully functional web application fully simulating an OS. Make a blend of Windows 11 and Linux, call it Winnux. The UI must completely copy the windows 11 vibe and has apps like in linux. ``` *Source: [@wildmindai](https://x.com/wildmindai/status/1991263000049615096)* --- ## 2. UI/UX & Design Prompts focused on creating aesthetically pleasing interfaces, shaders, and CSS masterpieces. ### 2.1. Futuristic Crypto Dashboard **Prompt:** ```text Reproduce a futuristic dark-mode crypto dashboard featuring high-contrast obsidian backgrounds, gradient-border glassmorphism UI elements, thin Inter typography, and neon-accented financial data visualizations. ``` *Source: [@RayaneRachid_](https://x.com/RayaneRachid_/status/1990871798095737152)* ### 2.2. Maximalist Design (Digital Hot Dogs) *Test Gemini's ability to create "trendy" and chaotic design styles (Dithering/Groovy).* **Prompt:** ```text Design a maximalist website for a fictional start up that sells digital hot dogs. I want beautifully animated hero text with shaders that interact with mouse hover. lots of dithering, wavy, groovy, gradients. ``` *Source: [@benhylak](https://x.com/benhylak/status/1991225744194691289)* ### 2.3. Jarvis HUD Interface **Prompt:** ```text Build a jarvis HUD interface for tony stark. ``` *Source: [@measure_plan](https://x.com/measure_plan/status/1991166530952810514)* --- ## 3. Creative & 3D Experiments Using libraries like Three.js, React Three Fiber, and MediaPipe via Gemini. ### 3.1. 3D Interactive Radio Globe **Prompt:** ```text A fully interactive 3d globe that lets you explore and stream radio stations from around the world. ``` *Source: [@sahilypatel](https://x.com/sahilypatel/status/1991192711139930187)* ### 3.2. Laser Eye Effect (CV + Three.js) **Prompt:** ```text - Use the computer's front-facing camera - Use `mediapipe` lib to capture facial landmarks - Use `threejs` to apply a LASER EYE effect to the face captured by the camera based on the real-time 3D landmark information provided by `mediapipe` ``` *Source: [@fangyex](https://x.com/fangyex/status/1991186281704173931)* --- ## 4. Multilingual Prompts (Chinese/CN) Gemini is excellent at handling multilingual coding requests. ### 4.1. Web-Based Rich Text Editor (Word Clone) **Prompt:** ```text å¸®æˆ‘å†™ä¸€ä¸ªç±»ä¼¼wordçš„ç½‘é¡µç‰ˆå¯Œæ–‡æœ¬ç¼–è¾‘å™¨ï¼ŒåŒ…å«å®ƒçš„ä¸»è¦åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰ä»£ç æ”¾åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªhtmlæ–‡ä»¶é‡Œã€‚ ``` *(English Translation: Help me write a Word-like web-based rich text editor, including its main functions, put all code in one html file.)* *Source: [@karminski3](https://x.com/karminski3/status/1991136616312963096)* ### 4.2. KOL Ranking List Landing Page **Prompt:** ```text ä½œä¸ºä¸€åæå…·å®¡ç¾çš„å‰ç«¯å·¥ç¨‹å¸ˆï¼Œåˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªã€Œä¸­æ–‡æ¨ç‰¹ KOL æ¦œå•ã€ç½‘ç«™è½åœ°é¡µï¼Œè®¾è®¡æ„Ÿæ‹‰æ»¡ï¼Œæç®€é…è‰²ï¼Œæ·±è‰²æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œé«˜å¯¹æ¯”åº¦ã€‚æ•°æ®æºé€šè¿‡ç½‘ç»œè·å–ã€‚ ä½¿ç”¨ tailwindcss + html5 ï¼ŒåŠ å…¥åŠ¨æ•ˆï¼Œç›´æ¥è¾“å‡º HTML ä»£ç ã€‚ ``` *(English Translation: As a frontend engineer with great aesthetics, create a "Chinese Twitter KOL List" website landing page, full design sense, minimalist color scheme, dark mode, high contrast. Fetch data sources via network. Use tailwindcss + html5, add animation, output HTML code directly.)* *Source: [@hellokaton](https://x.com/hellokaton/status/1991044658638840304)*

## MDZ.AI - All-in-One AI Toolkit Integrating 15+ Top AI Models

**Website:** https://mdz.ai

### What is this?

A platform that integrates multiple top AI models ğŸ¤–. No more switching between ChatGPT, Midjourney, Claude, and other platforms!

When doing e-commerce and content creation, I found myself subscribing to ChatGPT Plus ($20), Midjourney ($30), Claude Pro ($20), and more, costing over $165/month. Even worse, I had to log in to different websites for different tools, which was very inefficient. So I built MDZ.AI to integrate these AI tools into one platform.

### Core Features

- **GPT-5 Image Generation** - Using OpenAI's latest image generation model
- **Sora 2 Video Creation** - AI-driven video generation tool
- **All-in-One AI Chat** - Integrates GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, and other LLMs
- **AI Product Photography** - Generate professional product photos in 3-5 seconds, perfect for e-commerce sellers
- **AI Logo Design** - Quickly create professional brand identities
- **15+ Premium AI Tools** - Including video downloader, audio tools, image editing, etc.

### Why did I build this?

- **Save Money** - Pro version at $49/month, saving 70%+ compared to individual subscriptions (originally $165+/month)
- **Save Time** - All AI tools in one platform, no multiple logins needed
- **Latest Models** - First access to GPT-5, Sora 2, and other latest AI models
- **Free Trial** - Free tier available, no credit card required to start

### Who is it for?

- E-commerce sellers (Shopify, Amazon, Taobao, etc.) - Quickly generate product images and marketing materials
- Content creators - Articles, videos, images all in one place
- Designers - Logo, poster, UI design, etc.
- Developers and product managers - Prototyping, copywriting, etc.

### Pricing

- **Free Tier** - Limited usage quota, experience all features
- **Pro Version** - $49/month, includes all tools and ample monthly credits
- **Lifetime Version** - $1,999 one-time payment, lifetime access

Simply put: saves time and money from switching between multiple AI tool platforms.

Hope this helps friends who also need to use AI tools efficiently!

## TemplateCat - A little cat that picks up 9873 professionally designed templates for you

**Website:** https://www.templatecat.net/zh-cn

### What is this?

A little cat that helps you pick professionally designed templates ğŸ±. Just joking! It means "templates by categories".

When doing web design for clients (eg. a dentist website), I often need to compare templates across different website builders. Jumping between platforms was really annoying, so I made this tool.

### Where are the templates from 

- Framer
- Webflow
- Squarespace

(Will add Figma Sites and Readymag later, I guess 10k+ templates in the future)

### What are the features?
- **High quality templates** - I only choose from website builder products where they hire professional designers.
- **Browse by categories/features/styles** - eg. find "portfolio" or "minimalist" templates
- **On-page preview + device switching** - directly see desktop/tablet/mobile effects
- **Website builder pricing listed** - easy to compare costs
- (Coming soon: pricing range filters, merge similar tags)

Simply put: saves time jumping between different platforms to find templates.

Hope this helps friends who also need to quickly find templates!

TUIOS is a terminal-based window manager that provides a modern, efficient interface for managing multiple terminal sessions. Built with Go using the Charm stack (Bubble Tea v2 and Lipgloss v2), TUIOS offers a vim-like modal interface with comprehensive keyboard shortcuts, workspace support, and mouse interaction.

title: ã€Tutorial Self-promotionã€‘How to remover sora2 watermarks for free
content: REPO ğŸ‘‰ https://github.com/ZeroLu/sora-watermark-remover # How to remove watermark on Sora videos [![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-1.0-blue)](https://thesorawatermarkremover.com) [![Status](https://img.shields.io/badge/status-online-brightgreen)](https://thesorawatermarkremover.com) [![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-lightgrey)](./LICENSE) [![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ZeroLu/sora-watermark-remover?style=social)](https://github.com/ZeroLu/sora-watermark-remover/stargazers) A simple, step-by-step guide to using **TheSoraWatermarkRemover.com**, a free online tool to get clean, high-quality videos from OpenAI's Sora. **[â¡ï¸ Visit the Free Sora Watermark Remover Website](https://thesorawatermarkremover.com)** --- ## The Problem: The Annoying Dynamic Watermark Since Sora's launch, its stunning AI-generated videos have gone viral on platforms like TikTok. However, a major frustration for creators is the persistent and **dynamic watermark**. OpenAI has made it particularly challenging to get a clean version: screen recording is often blocked on the app, and every video on the web has this moving watermark embedded. Because it's dynamic, traditional removal methods often fail or leave ugly artifacts. ## The Solution: A Simple Online Tool Fortunately, there's a simple and effective solution: **[TheSoraWatermarkRemover.com](https://thesorawatermarkremover.com)**. This free online tool allows you to remove the Sora watermark in seconds, with **1 free uses upon login**. No registration, no payment, no software installation needed. ## ğŸ“– Step-by-Step Guide Follow these three simple steps to download your Sora video without the watermark. ### Step 1: Copy Your Sora Video Link You need the direct link to the Sora video. Here is how to get it from both the web and the mobile app. **From the Web:** Click the **three dots (...)** on the video and then select **"Copy link"**. **From the App:** Tap the **three dots (...)** or the **share icon (paper airplane)**, and then choose **"Copy link"**. ### Step 2: Paste the Link and Process Go to **[thesorawatermarkremover.com](https://thesorawatermarkremover.com)**, paste the video link you just copied into the input box, and click the button to start. ### Step 3: Download Your Watermark-Free Video The video is typically processed in **under 3 seconds**. Once it's ready, simply click the download button to save the clean video to your device. ## âœ¨ The Final Result The final video is perfectly clean with no visible watermark or processing flaws. It's ready for you to share or use in your projects! ## â­ Key Features - **ğŸ’§ High-Quality Removal**: Advanced algorithms cleanly remove the dynamic watermark without degrading video quality. - **ğŸ†“ Free to Use**: Get **1 free watermark removals** upon login. - **ğŸš€ Incredibly Fast**: Processes most videos in under 3 seconds. - **ğŸš« No Login Required**: No need to create an account or provide any personal information. - **ğŸ’» 100% Online**: Works directly in your browser on any device (desktop or mobile). No software to install. ## âš ï¸ Disclaimer This guide and the associated website are provided for **educational and research purposes only**. The ability to remove a watermark does not grant you ownership or copyright of the video content. Please respect OpenAI's Terms of Service and the intellectual property rights of the content. Users are solely responsible for their actions and any potential legal consequences. We do not endorse the use of this tool for any illegal or unethical activities. ## ğŸŒŸ Support This Project If you found this guide and tool helpful, please **give this repository a star â­ï¸**! Your support helps more people discover this simple solution for Sora watermark removal.
